category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WRKFLW_show_deferred_participant_assignments
preference.preference_description: Indicate whether to show deferred participant assignments in Active Workspace client. This feature is specifically designed to work with Teamcenter platform release 13.1 and higher. Valid Values: * true: User will be able to see deferred participant assignments. This is the default value. * false: User will not be able to see deferred participant assignments.
